descriptionHtml:
HI NEXUS!

This MOD adds a room where a follower's can wait.
It is possible to hold around fifty people.

It is located on the front of the gate of Whiterun.
You can enter the room from the trapdoor there.
Please see picture.
The marker is added automatically.

!Caution!
If you go out of this room with a lot of follower's, game may crash.
So you are preferred to fast travel when you go out of this room.
Don't worry, I set it to be able to fast travel from this room!

-Recommended MODS-
My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers by Volek
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045/?
This mod will change Follower's house/home.

Comphy Pool Breezehome - By Jalvarado261
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38393


NOTES:
This is in-fact a copy of this mod by Pontaso: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43877/?
Even though i liked his mod i thought i would extend it for my own tastes but then i thought i should share it with you cool people... so whats new?

1. Most obvious of all.. it's much bigger!
2. Seating Area.
3. Beds.
4. Alchemy Table
5. Enchanting Table.
6. Tanning Rack.
7. Workbench and Anvil.
8. Smelter.
9. Camp Fire's with seating and a Chopping Block and a free Axe.
10. 2 Storage Chests.
11. Lighting. (updated, much brighter now thanks to Jalvarado261)
12. Pool (now with auto-un/re-equip armour) thanks to Jalvarado261 for teaching me how.
13. Training Area.
14. Grindstone.
15. Small garden
16. Hidden Chest?




Credits:

Pontaso.
Jalvarado261
Bethesda.
Nexus.
author: Adipsycho
